t: Amazon
s: Amazon itself is governed by algorithms. These also do not like extended shipping times, and will not be kind to your listings. If you do make pre-sales, and then cannot fulfill them in the time promised, you will put your Account Health (AH) in jeopardy. The algorithm will suspend you.
